00028     class Object : public Frame {
00029 
00030      public:
00031 
00032         Object() { }
00033 
00034         string inspect() { return "[Object]"; }
00035 
00036     };
00037 
00038     class ObjectProto : public Object {
00039     
00040         void initSlots()
00041         {
00042             setSlot( Symbol::at( "self" ), new Method<ObjectProto>( &ObjectProto::self ) );
00043             setSlot( Symbol::at( "proto" ), new Method<ObjectProto>( &ObjectProto::proto ) );
00044             setSlot( Symbol::at( "slots" ), new Method<ObjectProto>( &ObjectProto::slotNames ) );
00045             setSlot( Symbol::at( "all-slots" ), new Method<ObjectProto>( &ObjectProto::allSlotNames ) );
00046             setSlot( Symbol::at( "set-slot" ), new Method<ObjectProto>( &ObjectProto::setSlot_ ) );
00047             setSlot( Symbol::at( "," ), new Method<ObjectProto>( &ObjectProto::_array_ ) );
00048         }
00049 
00050         string inspect() { return "[ObjectProto]"; }
00051 
00052         Value _array_( Array& args, Value self )   { return new Array( self, args.at( 0 ) ); }
00053 
00054         Value self( Array& args, Value self )
00055         {
00056             return self;
00057         }
00058 
00059         Value proto( Array& args, Value self )
00060         {
00061             if (self.getFrame()->proto())
00062                 return self.getFrame()->proto();
00063             else
00064                 return _nil_;
00065         }
00066         
00067         Value slotNames( Array& args, Value self )
00068         {
00069             //Array& names = *new Array;
00070             Frame& frame = *self.get<Frame>();
00071 
00072             map<Symbol*, Value>::iterator i;
00073             for (i = frame.slots().begin(); i != frame.slots().end(); ++i)
00074             {
00075                 //names.push( i->first );
00076                 cout << i->first->inspect() << " = " << i->second.inspect() << endl;
00077             }
00078 
00079             //return &names;
00080             return _nil_;
00081         }
00082 
00083         Value allSlotNames( Array& args, Value self )
00084         {
00085             //Array& names = *new Array;
00086             Frame* frame = self.get<Frame>();
00087 
00088             while (frame)
00089             {
00090                 cout << frame->inspect() << endl;
00091                 
00092                 map<Symbol*, Value>::iterator i;
00093                 for (i = frame->slots().begin(); i != frame->slots().end(); ++i)
00094                 {
00095                     //names.push( i->first );
00096                     cout << "  " << i->first->inspect() << " = " << i->second.inspect() << endl;
00097                 }
00098                 
00099                 frame = frame->proto();
00100             }
00101 
00102                 //return &names;
00103                 return _nil_;
00104         }
00105 
00106         Value setSlot_( Array& args, Value self )
00107         {
00108             BEG( "Object::_setSlot()" );
00109 
00110             cout << ">>> " << args.at( 1 ).inspect() << endl;
00111             Value result = self.setSlot( *args.at( 0 ).get<Symbol>(), args.at( 1 ) );
00112             
00113             END( result.inspect() );
00114             
00115             return result;
00116         }
